title: Paper shortage resolved for examinations: Minister
body_lines: Although there is a shortage of papers for examination purposes, it has been solved and that was not a huge issue that the Ministry was facing, Education Minister Dinesh Gunawardana said.
He told the media that all paper requirements for the upcoming GCE Ordinary Level (O/L) examination had been fulfilled.
He said necessary decisions had been taken to procure the additional paper requirements to hold the exams. (Chatuanga Samarawickrama)
